definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按时分没有平静，也能够或许选择围攻或水力压抑。

sentences.english: Odysseus sets sail as soon as the sun goes down.
sentences.chinese: 奥德修斯集帆尽快在日落时分。

sentences.english: A small street in Annecy, France, in late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚时分，法国安娜西的一条小街。

sentences.english: I remember hours of acne fast right next coated, printed pox will not leave.
sentences.chinese: 下次记得痘痘快好的时分涂，就不会留下痘印了。

sentences.english: I seldom go by bus except when it is rainy.
sentences.chinese: 除了下雨的时分，我很少乘公同汽车。

sentences.english: At sundown, the strong cold wind has shifted from the southeast to the northwest.
sentences.chinese: 日落时分成，强有力的冷风由东南风转为西北风。

sentences.english: The Wolf Man is a terrorizing half-man, half-wolf creature that strikes during the full moon.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的狼人是一种半人半狼的怪物，在满月时分发作。

sentences.english: Isn't that fun? I enjoy lying on the field at night and looking up at the starry sky.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥喜欢夜晚时分躺在营地上，看著满天星斗。

sentences.english: You cannot kill time without injuring eternity.
sentences.chinese: 消磨时分没有成能舶冢险永远。

sentences.english: It was dusk by the time the basket-maker returned.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时分老制篮商回来了。

sentences.english: Morning and sunset, the quater of the metropolitan where I live and work.
sentences.chinese: 朝旭和日落时分，我生活和工作的城市，窗外。

sentences.english: We were still there at dusk, when we pulled in to Kimberley.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时分，我们仍在往金伯利行进。

sentences.english: It was dinnertime when Reuben got home.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭时分，鲁本跨进家门。

sentences.english: I like to look at you simple cherubic smile.
sentences.chinese: 期待你，盼望你，幸福的过每一时分。

sentences.english: I told her the beer would make her look better at night than the cold cream.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉她在夜晚时分啤酒较冷霜让她显得更动人。

sentences.english: An additional method is disclosed for providing coexistence of two time-division systems.
sentences.chinese: 公开了一种用于提供两个时分系统的共存的附加方法。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
11 am-1 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
midnight/in the middle of the night
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
11 pm-1 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
5-7 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
